title: Recent Trends with Gerald Celente
content:
Recent trends in Elections and the Middle East Gerald Celente is one of today’s pioneers in trend strategy. <!--more--> He founded the Trends Research Institute and is the publisher of the Trends Journal that has been in operation since 1980.
He has since been one of the nation’s most sought after diagnosticians and forecasters on domestic and international events.
Gerald’s insights have been sought for by major networks, PBS and BBC, Russian TV, and publications such as the Economist and major newspapers.
